forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly before 5pm.  Partly sunny, with a high near 27. Northwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Mostly clear, with a low around -7. Wind chill values as low as -17. Northwest wind 6 to 11 mph becoming light west  after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 29 mph.
